title: Episode 295 - Walk of Shame
itunes:title: Episode 295 - Walk of Shame
itunes:subtitle: Free Friday: Emily talks about how to encourage your wife to fantasize, what gives Menace nightmares, Beyonces' weird eating habits, Brad Pitt opens up about his love for Angie, 5 tips for your walk of shame, panty dropping drinks,...
description:
We all have to do it, so we might as well know how to do it right. Today Emily drops five big tips for how to handle your next walk of shame. We then learn how to encourage your wife to fantasize, what gives Menace nightmares, and the Panty Dropper drink recipe. Plus, a new study shows men value love more than sex.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
